article.para: This article provides information on working with property files for exist applications.

sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: For most applications it is a good idea to provide settings in a property file. An exist-db-addons library, available in maven central, enables you to do so.

sect2.title: optionally mount properties as docker secret
sect2.para: In docker-compose.yml: secrets: - source: ${APPNAME}.properties target: teidictjson.properties mode: 0444 secrets: fhwbjson.properties: external: true
